name: sophia Coordination Tasks
description: Active coordination tasks managed by sophia

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Create visual style guide for SSELFIE Studio pricing launch campaign, including:
1. Color palette for cost comparison graphics
2. Template designs for testimonial showcases
3. Story highlight cover designs
4. Reel cover template for feature demonstrations
Focus on luxury editorial feel while maintaining approachability.
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Part of SSELFIE Studio pricing launch campaign, targeting 135K+ existing followers with focus on cost savings and value proposition.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Create landing page strategy aligned with social media campaign:
1. Design pricing comparison calculator
2. Develop testimonial showcase section
3. Create early-bird signup system
4. Set up analytics tracking for social media conversions
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Supporting SSELFIE Studio pricing launch campaign with website components that reinforce social media messaging about cost savings and value.

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Create visual assets for SSELFIE Studio launch campaign including:
1. Reel templates for cost comparison content
2. Story templates for feature previews
3. Carousel designs for educational content
4. Visual guidelines for testimonial spotlights
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Social media launch campaign targeting 135K followers, focusing on TRAIN, Maya chat, and SSELFIE gallery features. Need cohesive visual strategy that maintains luxury editorial feel while showcasing platform benefits.
expectedDeliverables: Visual style guide for launch campaign

assignedTasks.taskDescription:
Prepare website infrastructure for SSELFIE Studio launch:
1. Create optimized landing pages for Creator and Entrepreneur tiers
2. Set up early-bird pricing functionality
3. Implement waitlist system
4. Ensure smooth user onboarding flow
assignedTasks.workflowContext: Launching SSELFIE Studio to 135K followers with special early-bird pricing (Creator: €20/month, Entrepreneur: €47/month). Need website infrastructure to handle high traffic and conversions.
